name: DOSPunk RED
description:
An extremely simple, but exciting 80s cyberpunk adventure game! Quick rules to play hardstyle cyberpunk in the style of William Gibson with the frantic action typical of the Hong Kong, Bollywood, Korean and every other type of action movie you can imagine. It has only two pages.

This is a Free Kriegsspiel game . All you need is pen, paper and a single regular six-sided die to play.

This game is a homage to the original game that inspired this one: https://matausch.itch.io/dospunk 

This game is a variant of my simple science fiction rules, check them out too: https://henriique.itch.io/worker
